attributes.action: Have Anjem Choudary arrested for treason Threats for Britain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is to petition to have Anjem Choudary charged with treason and for making threats to the British people and Britain.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
